title: Shibboleth, or, Observations of severall errors in the last translations of the English & French Bibles together with many other received opinions in the Protestant churches, which being weighed in the ballance are found too light / written by John Despagne ... ; and translated into English by Robert Codrington ...
author: Espagne, Jean d', 1591-1659.
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Imperfect: paging from p. 162 to the end of the book is incomplete.
